entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:41 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 14. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:41 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
